org.jxls.expression

Class JexlExpressionEvaluatorNoThreadLocal

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jxls.expression.JexlExpressionEvaluatorNoThreadLocal
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ExpressionEvaluator

    public class JexlExpressionEvaluatorNoThreadLocal
extends Object
implements ExpressionEvaluator
    This is an implementation of ExpressionEvaluator without using ThreadLocal. See issue#54 for more detail about the reason for it
    Author:
    Leonid Vysochyn
